mapper.select:
select bh.id, bh.user_id, bh.room_id, bh.browse_time,
ri.room_number, ri.rent,
ai.name apartment_name, ai.district_name, ai.city_name, ai.province_name
from browsing_history bh left join room_info ri on bh.room_id = ri.id and ri.is_deleted = 0 left join apartment_info ai on ri.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0 where bh.is_deleted = 0 and bh.user_id = #{userId} order by bh.browse_time desc
select url,name from graph_info gi where is_deleted = 0 and gi.item_type = 2 and gi.item_id = #{room_id}
